        mult
        

        public static DistDenseMatrix mult(x10.lang.Int ps,
                   x10.lang.Double beta,
                   DistDenseMatrix A,
                   DistDenseMatrix B,
                   DistDenseMatrix C)
        

        Declaration: mult(ps:x10.lang.Int,beta:x10.lang.Double,A:x10.matrix.dist.DistDenseMatrix,B:x10.matrix.dist.DistDenseMatrix,C:x10.matrix.dist.DistDenseMatrix): x10.matrix.dist.DistDenseMatrix{self==C, C.grid.M==C.M, C.grid.N==C.N}.
        SUMMA algorithm C implementation API
        

        Parameters:
        ps - -- panel size
        beta - -- scaling factor of output matrix C
        A - -- first operand matrix
        B - -- second operand matrix
        C - -- output matrix
        

        Returns:
        -- output matrix C

      • 

        multTrans
        

        public static DistDenseMatrix multTrans(x10.lang.Int ps,
                        x10.lang.Double beta,
                        DistDenseMatrix A,
                        DistDenseMatrix B,
                        DistDenseMatrix C)
        

        Declaration: multTrans(ps:x10.lang.Int,beta:x10.lang.Double,A:x10.matrix.dist.DistDenseMatrix,B:x10.matrix.dist.DistDenseMatrix,C:x10.matrix.dist.DistDenseMatrix): x10.matrix.dist.DistDenseMatrix{self==C, C.grid.M==C.M, C.grid.N==C.N}.
        Perform parallel matrix multiplication with B transposed using SUMMA algorithm.
        

        Parameters:
        ps - -- panel size
        beta - -- scaling factor of output matrix C
        A - -- first operand matrix
        B - -- second operand matrix which will be used in transposed
        C - -- output matrix
        

        Returns:
        -- output matrix C
